text:
<human>: How many unique branches are present in the dataset?
<bot>: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Branch) FROM sales;

<human>: How many unique products were sold in each branch?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, COUNT(DISTINCT Product_line) FROM sales GROUP BY Branch;

<human>: What is the total quantity of products sold across all branches?
<bot>: SELECT SUM(Quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales;

<human>: How many transactions were made by each customer type?
<bot>: SELECT Customer_type, COUNT(Invoice_ID) FROM sales GROUP BY Customer_type;

<human>: Which branch made the highest number of sales?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, COUNT(Invoice_ID) AS sales_count FROM sales GROUP BY Branch ORDER BY sales_count DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: What is the earliest sale date recorded?
<bot>: SELECT MIN(Date) AS earliest_date FROM sales;

<human>: What is the most recent sale date recorded?
<bot>: SELECT MAX(Date) AS latest_date FROM sales;

<human>: What is the highest price per unit for any product?
<bot>: SELECT MAX(Unit_price) FROM sales;

<human>: What is the lowest price per unit for any product?
<bot>: SELECT MIN(Unit_price) FROM sales;

<human>: Which product line has the most transactions?
<bot>: SELECT Product_line, COUNT(Invoice_ID) AS transaction_count FROM sales GROUP BY Product_line ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: Which gender purchases the most products?
<bot>: SELECT Gender, SUM(Quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY Gender ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: What is the total revenue generated by each product line?
<bot>: SELECT Product_line, SUM(Total) AS revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Product_line ORDER BY revenue DESC;

<human>: What is the most commonly purchased product line for each city?
<bot>: SELECT City, Product_line, COUNT(Product_line) AS popularity FROM sales GROUP BY City, Product_line ORDER BY popularity DESC;

<human>: Which product line has the highest average rating?
<bot>: SELECT Product_line, AVG(Rating) AS avg_rating FROM sales GROUP BY Product_line ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: Calculate the revenue per unit for each product line.
<bot>: SELECT Product_line, SUM(Total)/SUM(Quantity) AS revenue_per_unit FROM sales GROUP BY Product_line;

<human>: What is the distribution of sales by time of day?
<bot>: SELECT HOUR(Time) AS hour, COUNT(Invoice_ID) AS sales_count FROM sales GROUP BY hour ORDER BY sales_count DESC;

<human>: What is the revenue distribution by time of day?
<bot>: SELECT HOUR(Time) AS hour, SUM(Total) AS revenue FROM sales GROUP BY hour ORDER BY revenue DESC;

<human>: How does the quantity sold vary across different times of the day?
<bot>: SELECT HOUR(Time) AS hour, SUM(Quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY hour ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

<human>: What is the average total revenue per transaction?
<bot>: SELECT AVG(Total) AS average_revenue FROM sales;

<human>: What is the total VAT collected each month?
<bot>: SELECT MONTH(Date) AS month, SUM(Tax_5) AS total_vat FROM sales GROUP BY month ORDER BY total_vat DESC;

<human>: Which time of day records the highest average rating?
<bot>: SELECT TIME_FORMAT(Time, '%H:00') AS hour, AVG(Rating) AS avg_rating FROM sales GROUP BY hour ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: Which branch generated the most revenue?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, SUM(Total) AS revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Branch ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: What is the average revenue generated per branch?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, AVG(Total) AS avg_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Branch ORDER BY avg_revenue DESC;

<human>: What is the total revenue for each city?
<bot>: SELECT City, SUM(Total) AS city_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY City ORDER BY city_revenue DESC;

<human>: What is the average revenue per customer type?
<bot>: SELECT Customer_type, AVG(Total) AS avg_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Customer_type;

<human>: How much revenue did each payment method generate?
<bot>: SELECT Payment, SUM(Total) AS payment_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Payment ORDER BY payment_revenue DESC;

<human>: How many male and female customers are there in each branch?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, Gender, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM sales GROUP BY Branch, Gender;

<human>: What is the most preferred payment method by gender?
<bot>: SELECT Gender, Payment, COUNT(*) AS payment_count FROM sales GROUP BY Gender, Payment ORDER BY payment_count DESC;

<human>: What is the total revenue generated by each gender?
<bot>: SELECT Gender, SUM(Total) AS revenue FROM sales GROUP BY Gender ORDER BY revenue DESC;

<human>: What is the average quantity of items purchased by each customer type?
<bot>: SELECT Customer_type, AVG(Quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY Customer_type;

<human>: What is the most common payment method used by each gender?
<bot>: SELECT Gender, Payment, COUNT(Payment) AS payment_count FROM sales GROUP BY Gender, Payment ORDER BY payment_count DESC;

<human>: On which day of the month are the most transactions made?
<bot>: SELECT DAY(Date) AS day_of_month, COUNT(Invoice_ID) AS transaction_count FROM sales GROUP BY day_of_month ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: Which month has the highest average rating?
<bot>: SELECT MONTH(Date) AS month, AVG(Rating) AS avg_rating FROM sales GROUP BY month ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;

<human>: What is the total VAT collected in each quarter?
<bot>: SELECT QUARTER(Date) AS quarter, SUM(Tax_5) AS total_vat FROM sales GROUP BY quarter ORDER BY total_vat DESC;

<human>: What is the most commonly used payment method for the highest revenue transactions?
<bot>: SELECT Payment, COUNT(*) AS payment_count FROM sales WHERE Total > (SELECT AVG(Total) FROM sales) GROUP BY Payment ORDER BY payment_count DESC;

<human>: Which branch has the highest gross income?
<bot>: SELECT Branch, SUM(gross_income) AS total_gross_income FROM sales GROUP BY Branch ORDER BY total_gross_income DESC LIMIT 1;

<human>: How does the quantity sold vary with each payment method?
<bot>: SELECT Payment, AVG(Quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY Payment ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;

<human>: What is the most common product line for high-value transactions?
<bot>: SELECT Product_line, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM sales WHERE Total > 500 GROUP BY Product_line ORDER BY product_count DESC;

<human>: What is the most common customer type for high revenue transactions?
<bot>: SELECT Customer_type, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM sales WHERE Total > (SELECT AVG(Total) FROM sales) GROUP BY Customer_type ORDER BY customer_count DESC;

<human>: How many transactions did each gender make during peak hours?
<bot>: SELECT Gender, COUNT(Invoice_ID) AS transaction_count FROM sales WHERE HOUR(Time) BETWEEN 18 AND 21 GROUP BY Gender ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
